sentence: He's not a fiscal conservative, he's a corrupt errand boy for the ultra rich,? says Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson, a Democrat who is running against Johnson.
author: John Nichols
title: Ron Johnson Breaks His Term-Limit Pledge in Order to Keep Serving the Billionaire Class

sentence: Out in Outagamie County, Wisconsin, two flights and a lengthy Lyft ride from Capitol Hill, US Senate candidate Tom Nelson follows events in Washington with disbelief as leaders of his own Democratic Party resist banning members of Congress from buying and selling stock.
author: Dave Levinthal
title: Democratic candidates blast Biden and Pelosi for not pushing Congress to pass a stock trade ban for lawmakers: 'Get in the ring!'
